title: Le portrait de la Prima Donna, Plate 4 from "Les Toquades"
marks:
Title, stamp and inscription

ULC, in the plate: LRC, in pencil: [Le Portrait de la Prima Donna 203
description: man in profile from PL, with shirt open and untucked, hammering a nail in a wall; picture leaning against wall at bottom
creditline: Gift of funds from John E. Andrus III
